MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the DG13 postcode area of Langholm. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:51pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair a grounded overhead line near to Westerhall affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:40 PM on Tuesday, 23 February 2021.
